}} Limpopo Province is one of the nine South African provinces. It borders three countries namely Zimbabwe, Mozambique and Botswana. South African boy of three drowns in Limpopo toilet - BBC News Why are South Africans burning schools in Limpopo? - BBC News It was started in 1994 with the name of Northern Transvaal but was renamed for the Limpopo River. == References == Category:1994 establishments in South Africa
